help.value:
This plugin will generate a sitemaps.org compatible sitemap of your Habari blog for consumption by search engines like Ask.com, Google, Microsoft and Yahoo!. A stylesheet is also included to make the sitemap visually appealing for the curious viewers.

This plugin will generate an uncompressed and gzip compressed sitemap.

You can also configure which of your content types you wish to include or exclude from your sitemaps.
